Nighlight/trinity:

"Do you meet him?"asked Nightlight.

Trinity jumped from Nightlight's arms and she ran towards Aerotaur "I 
did it Aeoratu!!!" said happily Trinity while she waved her tail "I 
found weapons button, you always knew that I could do it... and I did 
it... Do you have other important work that you like that I do?"
